content.prompt: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from among the answer choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Bonne idée, il faut toujours voyager sans bagages.
Tu as raison un garde du corps est indispensable.
Tu ne crois pas que tu vas le regretter?
Ça ne t'ennuie pas d'être à la charge des autres?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
